band-pullaparts.name: Band Pullaparts
band-pullaparts.notes: Part of recovery circuit - focus on scapular control

compression-throws.name: Compression Phase Throws
compression-throws.notes: Focus on clean mechanics at higher intent

foam-roll.name: Foam Roll
foam-roll.notes: Focus on major muscle groups, especially throwing arm chain

full-dynamic-warmup.name: Full Dynamic Warm-up
full-dynamic-warmup.notes: Complete full series of dynamic exercises with proper form

hip-flexor.name: Multi-Planar Hip Flexor Stretch w/Overhead Reach
hip-flexor.notes: Focus on full range of motion in all planes

isometrics-abduction-adduction.name: Isometric Abduction/Adduction
isometrics-abduction-adduction.notes: Maintain steady tension throughout the holds

isometrics-extension-flexion.name: Isometric Extension/Flexion
isometrics-extension-flexion.notes: Maintain steady tension throughout the holds

isometrics-rotation.name: Isometric External Rotation/Internal Rotation
isometrics-rotation.notes: Maintain steady tension throughout the holds

jaeger-bands.name: Jaeger Band Series
jaeger-bands.notes: Complete full series of band exercises with proper form

lax-roll.name: Lacrosse Ball Rollout
lax-roll.defaultReps: Roughly 20s per body part or to tolerance
lax-roll.notes: Target specific areas of tension, focus on shoulder and arm

light-catch.name: Light Catch
light-catch.notes: STRICT 60% RPE MAX - Focus on recovery and arm maintenance

light-stretching.name: Light Stretching (Optional)
light-stretching.notes: Only if feeling particularly tight or sore

long-toss.name: Long Toss
long-toss.notes: Build up distance gradually, maintain arm slot

plyo-crow-hops.name: Crow Hop Throws
plyo-crow-hops.notes: Focus on footwork and transfer of power

plyo-dropsteps.name: PlyoCare Drop Steps
plyo-dropsteps.defaultReps: 1 throw each with blue, red, yellow, gray
plyo-dropsteps.notes: Focus on quick footwork and exchange

plyo-halfstance.name: PlyoCare Half Stance
plyo-halfstance.defaultReps: 1 throw each with blue, red, yellow, gray
plyo-halfstance.notes: Focus on balance and throw accuracy

plyo-med-throws.name: Med Ball Throws
plyo-med-throws.notes: Focus on explosive movement and proper mechanics

plyo-pivot.name: PlyoCare Pivot Pickoffs
plyo-pivot.notes: Focus on footwork and quick exchange

plyo-reverse.name: PlyoCare Reverse Throws
plyo-reverse.defaultReps: 10 reps with 1 kg AND 2 kg balls
plyo-reverse.notes: Focus on deceleration and arm path

plyo-stepbacks.name: PlyoCare Catcher Step Backs
plyo-stepbacks.defaultReps: 1 throw each with blue, red, yellow, gray

plyo-wall-throws.name: Wall Throws
plyo-wall-throws.notes: Work on proper arm path and mechanics

recovery-activities.name: Recovery Activities (Optional)
recovery-activities.notes: Light walking, swimming, or other low-intensity activities if desired

rest-recommendations.name: Rest Day Recommendations
rest-recommendations.notes: Focus on quality sleep (7-9 hours), staying hydrated, and proper nutrition

throwdowns-long.name: *Throwdowns Long Spread (Weeks 5/6)
throwdowns-long.notes: One minute minimum rest between weight changes. First throw at 80% intent, then build up. For 2B/3B practice.

throwdowns-short.name: *Throwdowns Short Spread (Weeks 3/4)
throwdowns-short.notes: Take at least 1 minute rest between ball weights. First throw at 80% intent, then build up. For 2B practice.

upward-tosses.name: Upward Tosses
upward-tosses.notes: Focus on shoulder control and catch position

weighted-ball-catch.name: Weighted Ball Catch Play
weighted-ball-catch.defaultReps: 5 throws each - 11oz, 9oz, 7oz, 5oz throws to tolerance (~70% RPE)
weighted-ball-catch.notes: Finish with 5 throws with 4oz. Rest between weight changes.

wrist-weights.name: Wrist Weight Series
wrist-weights.notes: Complete all wrist weight exercises with control
